Awesome and one of the best movie of Bhagat Singh and other freedom faitor.
Best acting by all the artists.

Ajay Devgn, Sushant Singh, D. Santosh, Raj Babbar , Farida Jalal, and other co artists did their acting 100% perfectly.

A R Rahman too did the great work. His music suited the scene. He gave best background music and music for songs.

The entire ideology of Bhagat Singh shown here. It also shows the difference between Bhagat Singhs ideology and Gandhian ideology. It shows correctly that Gandhi and Nehru were Chor.
